alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A developing thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester County through 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm over Phillipston, or 7 miles east of Orange, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Leominster, Fitchburg, Gardner, Holden, Athol, Winchendon, Templeton, Rutland, Westminster, Ashburnham, Barre, Hubbardston, Princeton, Phillipston, Royalston and Petersham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
